subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A message posted on Twitter by Tyler Melling, a Class A pitcher for the Cardinals, grew into a loud rumble when he wrote that a green glob in Jon Lester’s hand looked like Vaseline.
snippet: A message posted on Twitter by Tyler Melling, a Class A pitcher for the Cardinals, grew into a loud rumble when he wrote that a green glob in Jon Lester’s hand looked like Vaseline.
